participant_1.background:
My relationship with my boss is still in its early stages.
I start my day by feeding my dog, who is always excited to see me.
I read a lot and spend my time on community activities.
I love the Fourth of July because it's a day to celebrate our country and spend time with friends and family.

I'm not married, but I love my new sweater.

the death of kurt cobain marred my middle school years.
I am passionate about civic engagement and making my voice heard.

content.text: Hello there! I am excited to be chatting with you today!
Hi! I am excited too. I'm from India, how about you?
I am from the USA! My family comes from Italy.
Oh, I love Italy! I have been there twice. I am from Punjab, India.
I have never been to India, but I would love to go someday.
You should! It is a beautiful country. Where in the USA are you from?
I am from New Jersey. I live in a small town outside of Philadelphia.
Oh, I have been to Philadelphia! It is a beautiful city.
Yes, it is! I love living here.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to read, spend time with my dog, and go to the beach.
Oh, I love reading too! What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read historical fiction. My favorite book is The Pillars of the Earth.
I have never read that book, but I have heard good things about it.
It is a great book! You should read it.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
